thread.title: Prepare to Lose Your Smartphone
thread.title_full: Prepare to Lose Your Smartphone - WSJ

author: Joanna Stern
title: Prepare to Lose Your Smartphone
text:
Building a backyard bunker for the apocalypse?
That’s up to you. But if you want to prepare for the personal apocalypse that occurs when you lose your smartphone, let’s get started.

Before anything, make sure your iPhone or Android phone auto-locks and requires a strong passcode (or fingerprint) to unlock it—the default security setting... RELATED VIDEO How to Prepare for a Lost Smartphone To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
